resources.string: Looks like a great day to take a stroll in the park
Great night to see the Moon and the stars.No clouds to block your view
Today we might as well ride the Polar Express, snow all the way
Oh oh,Hope your umbrella can weather this storm :(
In the spirit of today\'s weather, may you get blown away by your day
We tried to grab the fog, but we MIST :(
Cloudy day today, but there is always the silver lining
What did we tell you about the silver lining? At least it\'s partly cloudy today :)
You win tonight clouds, we\'ll see the moon and the stars more clearly on another day
Wear your socks,and have a cup of coffee at home or maybe you\'d like to have fun in the puddles outside :)
